name: custom-new-tab-page-idontknow
description: A Firefox extension that allows you to specify a custom URL to be shown when opening a new tab, without changing the address bar content
author: idontknow (forked from MethodGrab's)

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run lint-ext
scripts.start: web-ext run --source-dir src --firefox="C:\Program Files\Firefox Developer Edition\firefox.exe" --firefox-profile=dev-edition-default
